content.raw: Forward declare `Vector2i` and `Vector3d` and remove the `#include`.
actually I just saw Nate's comment about forward declaration of ign math headers being brittle so I reverted the changes. ed15e70
content.html: actually I just saw Nate's comment about forward declaration of ign math headers being brittle so I reverted the changes. ed15e70

content.raw: I think this `include` and the next one are not needed.
content.html: I think this include and the next one are not needed.

Vector2i and Vector3d are typedefs of templates, so I think you'll have to do something like:

namespace ignition
{
  namespace math
  {
    template<class T>
    class Vector2;

    template<class T>
    class Vector3;

    typedef Vector3<double> Vector3d;
    typedef Vector2<int> Vector2i;
  }
}

Which becomes very brittle.
